name: Competition Preparation
tagline: Transform your dedication into stage-ready excellence.
short_description: A full-service package to get you on stage looking your absolute best. From training and nutrition to posing and peak week — every detail covered.
description: Competition preparation is more than just getting in shape – it's about achieving peak conditioning, mastering stage presence, and presenting your absolute best self when it matters most. As a Pro Physique athlete with years of competition experience, Jake understands every aspect of what it takes to succeed on stage.
who_its_for: You have at least 1–2 years of consistent training experience
You're committed to following a structured program for 12–24 weeks
You understand that competition prep requires dedication and sacrifice
You want expert guidance through every aspect of preparation
You want to challenge yourself and achieve something extraordinary

includes.title: Personalised Training Programs
includes.description: Customised periodisation, progressive overload strategies, pre-competition training adjustments, and peak week protocols.

includes.title: Precision Nutrition Coaching
includes.description: Detailed macronutrient protocols, strategic carb cycling, supplementation guidance, and peak-week nutrition.

includes.title: Posing Instruction & Stage Presence
includes.description: Mandatory pose technique, individual routine development, stage presence and confidence building, competition day cueing.

includes.title: Ongoing Monitoring & Adjustments
includes.description: Weekly check-ins, real-time adjustments, body composition tracking, and continuous support.

includes.title: Competition Day Support
includes.description: Peak week management, competition day guidance, post-competition transition planning, and achievement celebration.

name: Online Coaching
tagline: Personalised training and nutrition guidance with real-time support. Delivered entirely online.
short_description: A tailored coaching package designed entirely according to your unique needs and goals — delivered anywhere in the world.
description: Distance shouldn't compromise the quality of your coaching experience. Our online coaching program delivers the same level of personalised attention, expert guidance, and proven results as in-person training – with the convenience and flexibility of training anywhere, anytime. This isn't about generic programs or automated responses. It's about building a real coaching relationship.
who_its_for: You want professional coaching but can't train in-person with Jake
You need a flexible program that fits your lifestyle
You're looking for real accountability and live check-ins
You want individualised plans, not generic templates
You're committed to consistent progress with expert guidance

includes.title: Personalised Training Programs
includes.description: Customised workout plans for your goals and equipment, with progressive programming and exercise video demonstrations.

includes.title: Comprehensive Nutrition Coaching
includes.description: Individualised macronutrient targets, meal planning guidance, supplement recommendations, and metabolic adjustments based on progress.

includes.title: Dedicated Coaching App Access
includes.description: All programs delivered through a professional platform with progress tracking, direct messaging, and exercise library with videos.

includes.title: Detailed Progress Monitoring
includes.description: Regular training and body composition assessments, progress photos, measurement tracking, and performance metrics.

includes.title: Fortnightly Live Virtual Check-Ins
includes.description: Scheduled one-on-one video calls for real-time program adjustments, direct feedback on technique, and personal accountability sessions.

name: Personal Training
tagline: Face-to-face coaching with expert guidance to build confidence, competence, and results.
short_description: One-on-one coaching sessions focused on proper form, progressive programming, and achieving your individual fitness goals.
description: Nothing replaces the power of face-to-face coaching in a professional gym environment. Our personal training delivers unmatched attention, expert guidance, and accelerated results through dedicated one-on-one sessions. This isn't about working out alone or figuring things out through trial and error. It's about building proper technique, real competence, and the confidence needed to achieve your goals.
who_its_for: You want hands-on coaching and immediate form correction
You're new to training and want to build a strong foundation
You've hit a plateau and need expert programming to break through
You want structured, progressive sessions with full accountability
You're in or near Melbourne and can train in-person

includes.title: Comprehensive Movement Assessment
includes.description: Posture and mobility evaluation, strength imbalance identification, injury history consideration, and movement pattern analysis.

includes.title: Structured Training Sessions
includes.description: Progressive strength training programs, equipment mastery and safety protocols, workout intensity optimisation, and session-based progress tracking.

includes.title: Technique Mastery Focus
includes.description: Compound movement fundamentals, equipment-specific training methods, form correction and refinement, and confidence building with weights.

includes.title: Ongoing Support & Accountability
includes.description: Weekly progress assessments, training log management, goal setting and milestone celebrations, and motivational coaching.

name: Posing Only
tagline: Master the art of presentation and maximise your competitive edge on stage.
short_description: Expert posing instruction that showcases your physique's strengths and maximises your competitive edge — for all federations.
description: Your physique tells a story, but your posing brings it to life. Whether you're competing in IFBB, NABBA, INBA, or any other federation, the way you present yourself on stage can be the difference between placing and winning. As a professional with a track record of developing winning athletes, Jake provides specialised coaching to ensure you command attention, showcase your strengths, and present with the confidence of a true competitor.
who_its_for: You're preparing for a competition and need posing guidance
You have your physique dialled in but want to present it better
You're competing in any federation — IFBB, NABBA, INBA, ICN, FMG, ANB
You're a first-timer who wants to walk on stage with confidence
You're an experienced competitor refining your routine

includes.title: Mandatory Pose Mastery
includes.description: Division-specific instruction, proper form, angles, and technique refinement, with individual adjustments for your unique physique.

includes.title: Individual Posing Routine
includes.description: Custom choreography tailored to your physique strengths, music selection guidance, seamless transitions, and personality integration.

includes.title: Physique Optimisation Strategy
includes.description: Highlighting your best features, minimising weaker areas through positioning, division-specific presentation, and federation rule compliance.

includes.title: Stage Presence Training
includes.description: Confidence building, performance psychology, stage walking skills, audience engagement, judge connection, and competition day mindset.
